description.zh_cn: 在用户登录成功之后的所有应用的数据初始化，会按照顺序执行
description.en_us: The data initialization of all applications after a successful user login is performed in sequence

description.zh_cn: 前后端双向数据传输开关，默认开启，关闭后影响的模块包括【导入导出】导入进度条，离线任务页面中上的下载提示，系统公告弹窗，站内信未读消息提示
description.en_us: This function is enabled by default. After this function is disabled, the modules affected include the import/export progress bar, download prompt displayed on the offline task page, system bulletin pop-up, and unread message notification

description.zh_cn: 开启后，开启锁屏功能，与锁屏超时时间一同使用
description.en_us: After this function is enabled, the screen lock function is enabled together with the screen lock timeout period

metadata.classification: 功能类配置(通过开关开启或关闭相应功能)

description.zh_cn: 用户与平台无交互时，系统自动锁屏，需重新输入密码登录（单位：秒）
description.en_us: When the user has no interaction with the platform, the system automatically locks the screen and needs to re-enter the password to log in (unit: second).

metadata.classification: 功能类配置(通过开关开启或关闭相应功能)

description.zh_cn: 布局和应用的适配关系
description.en_us: The fit between layout and application

description.zh_cn: 主题和应用的适配关系
description.en_us: The fit between theme and application
